title: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream Agrees to Settlement Over NYC Cashless Ban Law
description: The high-end ice cream chain agreed to comply with a New York City law that prohibits businesses from refusing to accept cash. It agreed to pay $33,500 in fines.
dc:creator: Remy Tumin
media:description: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream in New York City now must accept both cash and credit payments.
